text: Vestmanlands Läns Tidning (VLT) is a Swedish liberal newspaper published in Västerås, Sweden. ==History and profile== VLT was established in 1831. The paper was published in broadsheet format until 13 October 2004 when it was changed to tabloid. The circulation of VLT was 37,900 copies in 2010. It was 36,000 copies in 2012 and 33,600 copies in 2013. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1831 establishments in Sweden Category:Mass media in Västerås Category:Daily newspapers published in Sweden Category:Publications established in 1831
title: Vestmanlands Läns Tidning
